returnType: The CURRENT_DATE function returns a date value.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL CURRENT_DATE function returns the current date in the time zone of the current SQL session as set by the ALTER SESSION command.
sample:
ALTER SESSION SET TIME_ZONE = '-7:0'; select CURRENT_DATE
from dual; 9/10/2005 10:58:24 PM ALTER SESSION SET TIME_ZONE = '-2:0'; select CURRENT_DATE
from dual; 9/11/2005 3:58:24 AM
